test-suite.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs
test-suite.description: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs

test-case.description: Processes collector writes processes.csv and WMI JSON (Windows)
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Processes collector writes processes.csv and WMI JSON (Windows)

test-case.description: Processes collector logs WARN if CIM fails but still writes CSV
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Processes collector logs WARN if CIM fails but still writes CSV

test-case.description: Network collector writes baseline Windows command outputs
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Network collector writes baseline Windows command outputs

test-case.description: Users collector writes whoami_all and falls back to net user
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Users collector writes whoami_all and falls back to net user

test-case.description: EventLogs collector writes CSV+JSON per log when Get-WinEvent works
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.EventLogs collector writes CSV+JSON per log when Get-WinEvent works

test-case.description: EventLogs collector continues when a log fails (e.g. Security access denied)
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.EventLogs collector continues when a log fails (e.g. Security access denied)

test-case.description: Services collector writes services.csv and attempts drivers.csv
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Services collector writes services.csv and attempts drivers.csv

test-case.description: ScheduledTasks collector writes error marker if Get-ScheduledTask fails
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.ScheduledTasks collector writes error marker if Get-ScheduledTask fails

test-case.description: ScheduledTasks collector writes CSV+JSON when Get-ScheduledTask works
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.ScheduledTasks collector writes CSV+JSON when Get-ScheduledTask works
Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.Registry collector writes autoruns.csv (Windows)
Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.InstalledSoftware collector writes installed_software.csv (Windows)

test-case.description: DnsFirewall collector writes dns_cache and firewall_rules (Windows)
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Collectors (Windows paths) produce expected outputs.DnsFirewall collector writes dns_cache and firewall_rules (Windows)

test-case.description: Integrity log includes SHA256 and timestamps
test-case.name: Forensikit Unit.Core utilities.Integrity log includes SHA256 and timestamps
Forensikit Unit.Core utilities.ZIP creation produces a file
